channel.title: [show] rsps donate page [no-release]
channel.description:
Hi. I was bored so I made this Donator design.
I know the image of the troll doesn't fit but yeah, can be easly removed ^^
Time on design: 23minutes
Time on coding: 10minutes.
What you guys think? :D
Preview: http://i50.tinypic.com/fm30vo.png

item.title: [show] rsps donate page [no-release]
item.dc:creator: @nordiskhost nordiskhost
item.description:
@nordiskhost wrote:

The Web Guy:

Nice! A small suggestion that would be cool is to display an image of the item too, so when someone selects an item, it changes the image too.

Will do that :rolleyes:

Read full topic

item.title: [show] rsps donate page [no-release]
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

[quote=“nordiskhost, post:11, topic:463168”][quote author=The Web Guy link=topic=566514.msg4119252#msg4119252 date=1349482628]
Elaborate some on what makes it special and differentiates it from other systems. I like the layout and the very much so awkward troll in the bottom corner. But this seems pretty basic, what do you plan to do for selecting what items to donate for and such? More information and I’d love it, it looks like a nice idea so far!
[/quote]

RUBY: Oh I didn’t know that

The Web Guy:

I’m not verry good at English, so I don’t know if I understand you right.

But for selecting item you see where it says “red party hat” and there is a blue arrow there, its a customized select box.
And to the right it will automatic update the selected item and price

Yes this is a basic layout, if I used more time on it, it could be better.
But I’m busy with making a Free RSPS portal website

Will be released soon[/quote]

Nice! A small suggestion that would be cool is to display an image of the item too, so when someone selects an item, it changes the image too.

Read full topic

item.title: [show] rsps donate page [no-release]
item.dc:creator: @nordiskhost nordiskhost
item.description:
@nordiskhost wrote:

The Web Guy:

Elaborate some on what makes it special and differentiates it from other systems. I like the layout and the very much so awkward troll in the bottom corner. But this seems pretty basic, what do you plan to do for selecting what items to donate for and such? More information and I’d love it, it looks like a nice idea so far!

RUBY: Oh I didn’t know that

The Web Guy:

I’m not verry good at English, so I don’t know if I understand you right.

But for selecting item you see where it says “red party hat” and there is a blue arrow there, its a customized select box.
And to the right it will automatic update the selected item and price

Yes this is a basic layout, if I used more time on it, it could be better.
But I’m busy with making a Free RSPS portal website

Will be released soon

Read full topic

item.title: [show] rsps donate page [no-release]
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

You can also add parameters to them [IMG] tag.

Example; [IMG width=500 height=500] [/ IMG]

Read full topic

item.title: [show] rsps donate page [no-release]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“nordiskhost, post:7, topic:463168”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=566514.msg4119244#msg4119244 date=1349480946]

instead of url linking it, use [ img ] tags.

1024x768 ist always a smart idea to have on [ img ]

Then open up paint and shrink it? I mean come on, it isn’t that hard to do. Cropping is an option too.
[/quote]

It isn’t that hard to click on the link… lols[/quote]
I know, it’s just a preferred tool here. Granted you have 1 image. Think if you had 5-10, people get frustrated easy on here.

Read full topic
